ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about  Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you discuss a little how you use Flash of Light? I bought it, I don t think I have ever used it. I have seen it written that is is mainly good for PvP,
ygData.messageBody:
Can you discuss a little how you use Flash of Light? I bought it, I don't
think I have ever used it. I have seen it written that is is mainly good for
PvP, which I don't do. How does it work against monsters?

== Gilead, dwarven cleric of Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Rejection Kills. Disappointment Only Maims <douglas@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear


>From: "Rejection Kills. Disappointment Only Maims" <douglas@...>
>
>On Fri, 16 Jul 1999, Chas Watkins wrote:
>
>> Can you tell me though does Fear work on PC's not just on NPC's. i.e. in
a
>> PvP situation?
>
>Yup - Flash of Light and Fear/Inspire Fear are a great combination for
>buying yourself some room.
